languages.text:
"Приказ активации по кодовому слову "Избавление"? Превосходно".
"43. Поочередное удаление суставов, начиная с пальцев. Процесс привел к смерти, как и во все разы до этого. Тело будет сформировано и выращено вновь".
"59. Внутренние органы изъяты и помещены в щелочный раствор без отделения от нервной системы. Объект наблюдает расчленение и ощущает боль в полном объеме. Агония укрепляет связь с вуалью, но тело слабо и неизменно погибает".
"71. Тело объекта разрушается быстрее с каждым новым сотворением. В туловище помещен термобокс для поочередного охлаждения и нагрева с постоянной электростимуляцией. Объект прожил на 4 минуты больше предыдущего воскрешения".
"75. Физические пытки исключены. На голову объекта установлен аудио-визуальный обруч, транслирующий в сознание изображения агонизирующих сородичей. Остановка сердца зафиксирована спустя 19 минут".
"96. Объект обладает всеми прежними знаниями, включая воспоминания о боли и смерти, от чего выказывает полное послушание. Наблюдается феноменальное укрепление связи с вуалью, но при любых условиях тело живет не дольше трех минут".

"75. Физические пытки исключены. На голову объекта установлен аудио-визуальный обруч, транслирующий в сознание изображения агонизирующих сородичей. Остановка сердца зафиксирована спустя 19 минут".
"96. Объект обладает всеми прежними знаниями, включая воспоминания о боли и смерти, от чего выказывает полное послушание. Наблюдается феноменальное укрепление связи с вуалью, но при любых условиях тело живет не дольше трех минут".

languages.text:
"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as in every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."
"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its suffering kin into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."
"96. Subject in possession of all previous knowledge including memories of pain and death, and therefore fully compliant. Phenomenal strengthening of the veil connection observed, but the body survives for no longer than three minutes under any set of conditions."

traits.locale_text:
"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as on every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."
"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its agonising kinsfolk into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."
"96. Subject in possession of all previous knowledge including memories of pain and death, and therefore fully compliant. Phenomenal strengthening of the veil connection observed, but the body survives for no longer than three minutes under any set of conditions."

languages.text:
«"Libertas" como palabra clave para la activación? Excelente».
«43. Extracción secuencial de las articulaciones, empezando por los dedos de las manos. El proceso ha causado la muerte del sujeto, como en todos los casos previos. El cuerpo se regenerará y volveremos a ensamblarlo».
«59. Se han extraído los órganos internos y se han sumergido en una solución alcalina sin separarlos del sistema nervioso. El sujeto contempla su propio desmembramiento y experimenta el dolor en toda su plenitud. La agonía fortalece su conexión con el velo, pero el cuerpo es frágil y perece de manera inevitable».
«71. El cuerpo del sujeto se desintegra más deprisa cada vez que volvemos a ensamblarlo. Se ha implantado una termocaja en el torso para calentar y enfriar su interior de manera alterna mediante una constante estimulación eléctrica. El sujeto sobrevivió 4 minutos más en comparación con su anterior resurrección».
«75. Se ha interrumpido la tortura física y se ha instalado una banda audiovisual en la cabeza del sujeto para transmitir directamente a su conciencia imágenes del sufrimiento de sus congéneres. El paro cardiaco se registró al cabo de 19 minutos».
«96. El sujeto conserva todos sus conocimientos previos, incluido el recuerdo de su dolor y sus muertes, y por tanto se muestra totalmente sumiso. Se observa un fortalecimiento extraordinario de su conexión con el velo, pero el cuerpo no sobrevive más de tres minutos bajo ninguna condición de laboratorio».

"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as in every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."

languages.text:
「'デリヴァランス' を動員命令の隠語に？素晴らしい」
「43。指から順番に関節を切除する。その結果、以前のすべての例と同様にこのプロセスは死を招いた。肉体は再形成され、再成長するだろう」
「59。摘出された内臓が神経系統から切り離さずにアルカリ溶液に入れられた。被検体はバラバラにされる自分を目撃し、その痛みの激しさを体感した。苦痛はヴェールとの結合を強めるが、肉体が弱く、どうしても朽ちてしまう」
「71。被検体の肉体は、新しく組み立てられるたびに速く崩壊する。サーモボックスを胴体部に移植し、一定の電気刺激で冷却と加熱を交互に実施した。被検体は前回の復活時に比べ４分間長く生存した」
「75。肉体的拷問は中止された。視聴ヘッドバンドが被検体の頭に装着され、キンが苦痛にあえぐ映像が彼らの意識の中に送信された。19分後に心停止が記録された」
「96。被検体は苦痛と死の記憶を含む以前の知識をすべて保持しているため、完全に従順である。ヴェール結合の驚異的な強化が観察されたが、肉体はいかなる条件下でも３分間以上は生存できなかった」
languages.original_text:
"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as in every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."
"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its suffering kin into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."
"96. Subject in possession of all previous knowledge including memories of pain and death, and therefore fully compliant. Phenomenal strengthening of the veil connection observed, but the body survives for no longer than three minutes under any set of conditions."

「71。被検体の肉体は、新しく組み立てられるたびに速く崩壊する。サーモボックスを胴体部に移植し、一定の電気刺激で冷却と加熱を交互に実施した。被検体は前回の復活時に比べ４分間長く生存した」
「75。肉体的拷問は中止された。視聴ヘッドバンドが被検体の頭に装着され、キンが苦痛にあえぐ映像が彼らの意識の中に送信された。19分後に心停止が記録された」
「96。被検体は苦痛と死の記憶を含む以前の知識をすべて保持しているため、完全に従順である。ヴェール結合の驚異的な強化が観察されたが、肉体はいかなる条件下でも３分間以上は生存できなかった」

languages.text:
“用‘解脱’作为激活命令的密码？真是个不错的主意。”
“43.连续摘除关节，从手指开始。这个过程导致实验对象死亡，就像之前的例子一样。该实验对象的身体将被用于改造和再生。”
“59.在不剥离神经系统的情况下切除内脏，将其置于碱性溶液中。实验对象观察着自己被肢解的全过程，体验到了最大程度的疼痛。痛苦加强了与面纱的联系，但肉体过于脆弱，会不可避免地消亡。”
“71.每出现一次新的组合，实验对象的肉体都会进一步加快。将躯干置入保温箱，交替冷却与加热，施加不断的电刺激。与上次实验相比，该实验对象多活了4分钟。”
“75.停止肉体折磨，将视听装置戴在受试者头上，向其意识中播放族人遭受折磨的图像。实验对象在19分钟后心脏骤停。”
“96、实验对象拥有先前的所有知识，包括痛苦与死亡的记忆，因此表现出完全服从的态度。实验对象对面纱的链接显著加强，但肉体无论在怎样的条件下，存活时间都无法超过三分钟。”
languages.original_text:
"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as in every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."
"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its suffering kin into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."

“59、在不剥离神经系统的情况下切除内脏，将其置于碱性溶液中。实验对象观察着自己被肢解的全过程，体验到了最大程度的疼痛。痛苦加强了与面纱的联系，但肉体过于脆弱，会不可避免地消亡。”

languages.text:
« Délivrance » comme mot de passe pour l'ordre d'activation ? Parfait. »
« 43. Ablation consécutive de différentes articulations, à commencer par les doigts. Le processus a entraîné la mort du sujet, comme lors des tentatives précédentes. Le corps sera reformé et régénéré. »
« 59. Les organes internes ont été excisés et placés dans une solution alcaline sans être séparés du système nerveux. Le sujet est témoin de son propre démembrement et en ressent toute la douleur. L'agonie renforce le lien avec le voile, mais le corps est faible et périt inévitablement. »
« 71. Le corps du sujet se désintègre plus vite à chaque nouvel assemblage. Une boîte thermique a été introduite dans le torse. Elle est destinée à chauffer et à refroidir en alternance, avec une stimulation électrique constante. Le sujet a survécu 4 minutes de plus que la tentative précédente. »
« 75. « Cycle de torture physique interrompu. Un bandeau audiovisuel a été placé sur la tête du sujet, qui voit désormais défiler des images de ses semblables en train de souffrir. Arrêt cardiaque enregistré 19 minutes plus tard. »
« 96. Le sujet est en possession de toutes les connaissances antérieures, y compris des souvenirs de douleur et de mort. Il obéit sans broncher. Le lien avec le voile s'est renforcé de manière significative, mais le corps ne survit pas plus de 3 minutes, quelles que soient les conditions. »
languages.original_text:
"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as in every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."
"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its suffering kin into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."
"96. Subject in possession of all previous knowledge including memories of pain and death, and therefore fully compliant. Phenomenal strengthening of the veil connection observed, but the body survives for no longer than three minutes under any set of conditions."

« 59. Les organes internes ont été excisés et placés dans une solution alcaline sans être séparés du système nerveux. Le sujet est témoin de son propre démembrement et en ressent toute la douleur. L'agonie renforce le lien avec le voile, mais le corps est faible et périt inévitablement. »
« 71. Le corps du sujet se désintègre plus vite à chaque nouvel assemblage. Une boîte thermique a été introduite dans le torse. Elle est destinée à chauffer et à refroidir en alternance, avec une stimulation électrique constante. Le sujet a survécu 4 minutes de plus que la tentative précédente. »
« 75. « Cycle de torture physique interrompu. Un bandeau audiovisuel a été placé sur la tête du sujet, qui voit désormais défiler des images de ses semblables en train de souffrir. Arrêt cardiaque enregistré 19 minutes plus tard. »
« 96. Le sujet est en possession de toutes les connaissances antérieures, y compris des souvenirs de douleur et de mort. Il obéit sans broncher. Le lien avec le voile s'est renforcé de manière significative, mais le corps ne survit pas plus de 3 minutes, quelles que soient les conditions. »

languages.text:
"'Erlösung' als Codewort zur Aktivierung? Ausgezeichnet."
"43. Schrittweise Entfernung von Gelenken, angefangen mit Fingern. Prozess führte wie in den Durchläufen zuvor zum Tod. Körper wird wiederhergestellt und wächst nach."
"59. Innere Organe werden entnommen und in alkalische Lösung gelegt, ohne dass Nervensystem abgetrennt wird. Das Testsubjekt erlebt eigene Zerstückelung und empfindet Schmerz in voller Intensität. Die Qualen verstärken die Verbindung zum Schleier, aber Körper ist schwach und wird unweigerlich sterben."
"71. Körper des Testsubjekts zerfällt mit jeder neuen Wiederherstellung schneller. Thermobox wurde zur abwechselnden Kühlung und Wärme im Torso platziert, dazu konstante elektrische Stimulation. Testsubjekt überlebte vier Minuten länger als bei vorheriger Wiederherstellung."
"75. Körperliche Folter nicht fortgesetzt. Audiovisuelles Stirnband wird Testsubjekt auf den Kopf gesetzt, um Bewusstsein des Testsubjekts mit Bildern seiner leidenden Art zu fluten. Herzstillstand 19 Minuten später."
"96. Testsubjekt im Besitz sämtlichen früheren Wissens, einschließlich Erinnerung an Schmerz und Tod, und als Folge voll gefügig. Exorbitante Verstärkung der Verbindung zum Schleier festgestellt, aber Körper überlebt nicht länger als drei Minuten, unabhängig von den Bedingungen."
languages.original_text:
"'Deliverance' as the activation order codeword? Excellent."
"43. Sequential joint removal, starting with the fingers. The process resulted in death, as in every previous instance. The body will be reformed and regrown."
"59. Internal organs excised and placed into an alkaline solution without severance from the nervous system. The subject is observing its dismemberment and experiencing the pain at its full intensity. The agony strengthens the connection to the veil, but the body is weak and inevitably perishes."
"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its suffering kin into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."
"96. Subject in possession of all previous knowledge including memories of pain and death, and therefore fully compliant. Phenomenal strengthening of the veil connection observed, but the body survives for no longer than three minutes under any set of conditions."

"'Erlösung' als Codewort zur Aktivierung? Ausgezeichnet."
"43. Schrittweise Entfernung von Gelenken, angefangen mit Fingern. Prozess führte wie in den Durchläufen zuvor zum Tod. Körper wird wiederhergestellt und wächst nach."
"59. Innere Organe werden entnommen und in alkalische Lösung gelegt, ohne dass Nervensystem abgetrennt wird. Das Testsubjekt erlebt eigene Zerstückelung und empfindet Schmerz in voller Intensität. "71. Körper des Testsubjekts zerfällt mit jeder neuen Wiederherstellung schneller. Thermobox wurde zur abwechselnden Kühlung und Wärme im Torso platziert, dazu konstante elektrische Stimulation. Testsubjekt überlebte vier Minuten länger als bei vorheriger Wiederherstellung."
"75. Körperliche Folter nicht fortgesetzt. Audiovisuelles Stirnband wird Testsubjekt auf den Kopf gesetzt, um Bewusstsein des Testsubjekts mit Bildern seiner leidenden Art zu fluten. Herzstillstand 19 Minuten später."
"96. Testsubjekt im Besitz sämtlichen früheren Wissens, einschließlich Erinnerung an Schmerz und Tod, und als Folge voll gefügig. Exorbitante Verstärkung der Verbindung zum Schleier festgestellt, aber Körper überlebt nicht länger als drei Minuten, unabhängig von den Bedingungen."

languages.text:
"Etkinleştirme emri kodu için 'Kurtuluş' nasıl? Harika."
"43. Parmaklardan başlayarak art arda eklem çıkarımı. Süreç, tıpkı önceki tüm örneklerde olduğu gibi ölümle sonuçlandı. Beden yeniden şekillendirilip geliştirilecek."
"59. İç organlar çıkarılarak sinir sisteminden ayrılmadan alkali çözeltisine yerleştirildi. Denek, uzuvlarının kesilmesini gözlemliyor ve acıyı tüm yoğunluğuyla hissediyor. Izdırabı örtüyle olan bağını güçlendirse de bedeni zayıf düştü. Helak olması kaçınılmaz."
"71. Deneğin bedeni, her yeni birleşimle birlikte daha hızlı parçalanıyor. Sürekli elektrik uyarımıyla alternatif soğutma ve ısıtma yöntemleri için gövdesine Isıkutu yerleştirildi. Denek, önceki diriltmelere kıyasla 4 dakika daha fazla hayatta kaldı."
"75. Fiziksel işkence sekteye uğradı. Acı çeken soydaşlarının görüntülerini zihninde yayımlaması için deneğin kafasına görsel işitsel kafa bandı yerleştirildi. Kalp durması, 19 dakika sonra kaydedildi."
"96. Denek, acı ve ölüm hatıralarını da içeren önceki tüm bilgilere hâkim. Bu nedenle tamamen riayetkâr. Örtü bağlantısının fevkalade bir oranda güçlendirildiği gözlemlendi. Ancak beden, belirtilen koşulların hiçbirinde üç dakikadan fazla hayatta kalamadı."

"71. The subject's body disintegrates faster with each new assembly. Thermobox introduced into the torso for alternate cooling and heating with constant electrical stimulation. The subject survived for 4 minutes longer compared to the previous resurrection."
"75. Physical torture discontinued. Audiovisual headband placed on the subject's head to broadcast images of its suffering kin into its consciousness. Cardiac arrest recorded 19 minutes later."
"96. Subject in possession of all previous knowledge including memories of pain and death, and therefore fully compliant. Phenomenal strengthening of the veil connection observed, but the body survives for no longer than three minutes under any set of conditions."
